definitions.text: a mechanical device that moves fluid or gas by pressure or suction
the hollow muscular organ located behind the sternum and between the lungs; its rhythmic contractions move the blood through the body
examples: he stood still, his heart thumping wildly

definitions.text: operate like a pump; move up and down, like a handle or a pedal
draw or pour with a pump

examples: The athlete pumps weights in the gym

definitions.text: raise (gases or fluids) with a pump

examples: She pumped the witnesses for information
